abstract: A fleet of Ford Crown Victoria cruisers in Iredell County has been converted to propane, a process financed partly by money confiscated in drug busts.
snippet: A fleet of Ford Crown Victoria cruisers in Iredell County has been converted to propane, a process financed partly by money confiscated in drug busts.
lead_paragraph: Thanks in part to confiscated drug money, criminals in Iredell County, N.C., may catch a ride in a patrol car powered by liquid propane.

headline.main: Propane Powers Patrol Cars in North Carolina
